amlInterruptTitle: Your business must be registered with an AML supervisory body welsh
text1: To confirm your anti-money laundering (AML) registration, we need to check the name of your business is the same as the one your supervisory body holds welsh.
text2: If the AML registration is in your name, the details will not match and we will reject your application welsh.
text3: To register your business as an authorised agent, you'll need to welsh
link1: register the business with an AML supervisory body welsh
text4: Or, to register yourself as an authorised agent, you can welsh
link2: apply as a sole trader welsh.
